channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Premium Addons for Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Premium Addons for Elementor

item.title: CVE-2021-24257|2024-08-03T19:28:22.250Z -- unknown -- premium%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: The “Premium Addons for Elementor” WordPress Plugin before 4.2.8 has several widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
